Author: gejdog
Text: thank you so much, i told my mom today and she said she supports me in recovery but i also have to do school, my dad on the other hand said he doesn’t want to hear about it, but that’s his coping mechanism i guess, he just doesn’t want to face reality

Author: PassionFruitYellow
Text: If you're too scared to say it out loud. You could write a note saying very briefly what's going on or just saying you need to talk them. I don't know how good you're relationship is with you're parents or how open they are to mental health issues? But telling them when they're not busy and they're calm would be the way to go. It's a terrifying thing to do but in the long run it's so much better to get help as soon as possible.
